extension-param.param-value: style:#site-translate-header-wrapper{width:auto!important} #top #mainbody .feature ul li p {margin: 37px 17px 10px 10px;text-align: left;font-size: 80%;} #top #mainbody #topsidearea ul.bnr li p {line-height: 1.0;} #mainbody #main #sidearea #sidemenu h4 {font-size: 130%;} #characteristics #mainbody #main #sidearea #sidemenu h4 {font-size: 110%;} #products #mainbody #sidearea #sidemenu .search input, #products #mainbody #sidearea #sidemenu .search select {width:100%;} #footer ul li{float: none;width: auto;} #products #mainbody #main #sidearea #recommendmenu h4:lang(en) { font-size: 110%; } #characteristics.chara #mainarea ul li p {left: 50px;top: 57px;line-height: 1.3;} #mainbody #main #sidearea #sidemenu h4 a:lang(en){ font-size: 90%; } /* en menu */ #header ul#gnavi li.gnavi01:lang(en) { background: url(//www.daiomfg.co.jp/material/images/common/en/gnavi_01_on.gif) no-repeat; }#header ul#gnavi li.gnavi02:lang(en) { background: url(//www.daiomfg.co.jp/material/images/common/en/gnavi_02_on.gif) no-repeat; }#header ul#gnavi li.gnavi03:lang(en) { background: url(//www.daiomfg.co.jp/material/images/common/en/gnavi_03_on.gif) no-repeat;
